title: Phidias Greek
content:
Phidias Greek is a metal typeface designed by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf) for [D. Stempel AG](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/typophile.com/wiki/D.%20Stempel%20AG). It is designed to be used together with [Michelangelo](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michelangelo). A digital version of the glyphs is included in the [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype) typeface [Palatino nova Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/www.linotype.com/109974/palatinonovatitling-font.html).

Please see the [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027182009/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino) entry for more information.
author: dan_reynolds
